titles.title: A bill to make a correction in the Education and Training for a Competitive America Act of 1988.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.

vote.text: Passed House by Yea-Nay Vote: 393 - 9 (Record Vote No: 379).

action.text: Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

bill.summary: 9/28/1988--Introduced. Amends the Education and Training for a Competitive America Act of 1988 to extend through FY 1992 the authorization of appropriations for the Access Demonstration Programs (for training of secondary school personnel, including guidance counselors).
